about_the_game:
As a result of the experiment, the main character of the game, Aurora, is transported through a portal from Earth to an amazing planet called "Sunglade," where it's eternally summer. A planet where cherry blossoms don't bloom, but Galactic flowers do. A planet inhabited by space knights and kings, and among the locals, you can meet not only cat-girls but even blue raccoons with magical abilities.

The past life is gone forever, and Aurora must solve the mysteries of this new planet, build relationships with new friends and maybe, if lucky, find his love. In this world, nothing is simple; Aurora must constantly decide who he can truly trust and who might stab him in the back. Gradually, the question of "how to return back" occupies the main character less and less...

Our game is unique with a combination of two styles: the story's introduction and ending are in the style of space opera, while the rest of the story is in the anime style. It's a game where there are no "empty" choices, and the course of the story will change based on your actions.
